title: 4 PC parts you should never buy refurbished
description: You will save money at first, but it will cost you later
content: The refurbished PC hardware market has always thrived in enthusiast circles, thanks to the constant flux in component prices. One month, a GPU costs as much as a small car; the next, it's half the pr… [+5726 chars]
